item.title: CDC Staff Tell Journalist They Felt Targeted Even Before Atlanta Campus Shooting
item.description: KFF Health News journalists made the rounds on national and local media recently to discuss topical stories. Here’s a collection of their appearances.

item.title: Reduced ACA Subsidies May Make It Harder for Young Adults To Afford Coverage
item.description: Get our weekly newsletter, The Week in Brief, featuring a roundup of our original coverage, Fridays at 2 p.m. ET.

item.title: Maryland Taps Affordable Care Act Fund To Help Pay for Abortion Care
item.description: The state is using an old source of funding to pay for a new money crunch: assisting out-of-state patients with the costs associated with abortion.

item.title: Breaking Down Why Medicare Part D Premiums Are Likely To Go Up
item.description: Insurers will take drug costs, frequency of use, and other factors into account as they set premium amounts for the 2026 plan year.

item.title: KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Trump Further Politicizes Science
